name: Night At The Warehouse
description:
Night At The Warehouse is a horror survival point and click game where you are left alone in an abandoned warehouse to defend yourself .

How bad do you think your game is?

Not very good

Are you proud of your game?

Yes

Could a youtuber play your game and pretend he was scared?

Yes

How to play?

Press E on computer to enter computer view

- You will automatically start doing tasks

Press Space in computer view to view cameras

- You can't do tasks at the same time

Press LMB / RMB to switch between cameras

Don't let Becky get close!

Don't let Pricess turn off power!

Don't let Slither eat you!

Game made by:
Sami "Samimies" Laatikainen
Aaron "Turismo" Englund

https://samilaatikainen.com/
https://turismomusic.itch.io/
